assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Baumer S.A. develops solutions for health industry in Brazil. It offers environment monitor, an electronic system that monitors particles suspended in air PM10 and PM2.5; temperature; relative humidity; concentration of carbon dioxide (CO2) and chemical pollutants (VOC); environmental noise intensity; lighting conditions; presence of people and animals; and relative pressure. The company also provides wet and dry nebulization; PURAVAC; purify; and dental solutions, such as bone graft and membrane solutions. In addition, it offers equipment for disinfection, water treatment, sterilization, cleaning, life science, and surgical rooms, as well as equipment for various accessories; and orthopedic solutions consisting of hip and knee prosthesis, shoulder prosthesis, non-conventional orthopedic solutions, intramedullary fixation solutions, external and internal fixations, and column and neurosurgery solutions. Further, the company provides preventive, corrective, and chamber maintenance and cleaning services; inspection and calibration, water and steam system inspection, and spare part services; and weaving tread services. Baumer S.A. was founded in 1952 and is headquartered in Pacaembu, Brazil.
